basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Brett Sharp Scholarship for Public Administration

description: This scholarship, established by MPA alumnus Kory Atcuson to honor his former Political Science professor, Dr. Brett Sharp, recognizes UCO MPA students for their commitment to academic excellence as well as professional experience. Eligibility Requirements Graduate Student Minimum part-time graduate status Enrolled for the semester after scholarship is disbursed MasterÂ’s in Public Administration major Minimum 3.5 GPA Submit an essay between 2 and 3 pages in length on how your academic studies and practical experiences have/will shape you as a Public Administrator
